## ProfileHandler.createInstance() method

Creates a new instance of a schema resource

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  schema | Schema \| undefined | <i>(Optional)</i> The schema instance to create |
